# traceShiny

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This is the web-server version of our R package, TRACE (Tandem Repeat Analysis from Capillary Electrophoresis), please visit the TRACE Github page for more [details](https://github.com/zachariahmclean/trace).

## Installation

You can install the development version of traceShiny from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("zachariahmclean/traceShiny")
```
